sentences.sentence: It will result in cytotoxic edema (cellular swelling).
sentences.translation: 它会导致细胞毒性水肿（细胞肿胀）。

sentences.sentence: Both helper and cytotoxic t cells are stimulated by platelets.
sentences.translation: 辅助和细胞毒t细胞均能被血小板激活。

sentences.sentence: Both "helper" (CD4) and "cytotoxic" (CD8) T-cell classes have been described.
sentences.translation: 现已明确两类T细胞：辅助性T细胞(CD4)和细胞毒性T细胞(CD8)。
